risk_conditions.alert: High humidity and warm temperatures detected â€” tomatoes may be at risk of Early Blight. Monitor plants closely for dark spots on leaves.
Cool, wet conditions favor Late Blight development in tomatoes. Check for water-soaked lesions on leaves and stems.
Cool, wet conditions increase the risk of Late Blight in potatoes. Inspect plants for white fungal growth and dark lesions.
Heavy rainfall and high humidity significantly increase the risk of Rice Blast infection. Look for diamond-shaped lesions on leaves.
Warm, humid, and rainy conditions favor Bacterial Leaf Blight in rice. Watch for yellow-to-white lesions on leaf margins.
Moderate temperatures and humidity create ideal conditions for Powdery Mildew on wheat. Check for white powdery patches on leaves.
Warm temperatures with moisture promote Rust disease in wheat. Look for orange-brown pustules on leaves and stems.
Cool and wet conditions increase the risk of Downy Mildew in apples. Inspect for pale green to yellow spots on leaves.
Warm, moist conditions during bloom favor Fire Blight in apples. Look for blackened, scorched-looking shoots and flowers.
Warm temperatures with heavy rainfall increase Anthracnose risk in maize. Check for irregular brown lesions on leaves.
Hot and humid conditions with rain promote Southern Corn Leaf Blight. Look for long, tan lesions on leaves.
Hot and humid weather increases Bacterial Wilt risk in chickpea. Watch for sudden wilting of plants.
Cool and wet conditions favor Ascochyta Blight in chickpea. Look for brown spots with dark margins on leaves and pods.
Warm conditions increase Fusarium Wilt risk in kidney beans. Watch for yellowing and wilting of lower leaves.
Wet and moderately warm conditions promote Angular Leaf Spot in kidney beans. Look for angular brown spots on leaves.
Warm humid conditions with rain favor Cercospora Leaf Spot in pigeon peas. Check for circular brown spots on leaves.
Moderate temperatures with high humidity create conditions for Powdery Mildew on moth beans. Look for white powdery growth.
Hot and dry-to-moderate humidity conditions favor whitefly activity, spreading Yellow Mosaic Virus in mung beans.
Heavy rain and high humidity increase Web Blight risk in black gram. Look for web-like fungal growth on plants.
Cool and humid conditions with rain favor Leaf Spot diseases in lentils. Monitor for brown or gray spots on leaves.
